CustomField.formula: IF(OR(On_Prem_Multi_year_product__c = true,Has_Trial_Product__c = true,ISPICKVAL(Deal_Type__c, 'Contract Replacement')),1, IF(OR(Repstor_Retro__c = true,Repstor__c = true,Legacy_Repstor_Agreement__c = true),2, IF((Partner_Related__c = true),3, IF((Cloud_Migration__c = true),4,0))))
CustomField.label: Other product approval
